author: raxzar

text:
It's more or less a much more detailed OoT, but it was still a great game.  

Majora's Mask was awesome though.  It was theoretically short, having only a handful of dungeons, and only 5 bosses (not counting minibosses), but the whole time travelling aspect is what made it so replayable.  You could go back and do everything over, without having to erase and start a new game!
